markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Shraen Gazetter](/Articles.aspx?ID=18)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 66</row>

Undead [drow](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=37) are masters of the necropolis of Shraen in the Black Desert. Explore its streets and markets to learn why the living prize this ancient city of the dead.
name: Shraen Gazetter
